sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import Header from './Header' import { useNavigate, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' function Edit() { const {id} = useParams() const [file, setFile] = useState(null); const [title, setTitle] = useState(""); const [price, setPrice] = useState(""); const [discount, setDiscount] = useState(""); const [discription, setDiscription] = useState(""); const [productType, setProductType] = useState(""); const navigate = useNavigate(); const files = file ? [...file] : []; useEffect(() => { if (!sessionStorage.getItem('userid')) { navigate('/'); } axios.get(`http://localhost:5000/admin/getsingleproduct/${id}`, { }) .then(function (response) { // console.log(response.data.productData); console.log(response.data.data); setTitle(response.data.data.title) setPrice(response.data.data.price) setDiscount(response.data.data.discount) setDiscription(response.data.data.discription) setProductType(response.data.data.productType) }) .catch(function (error) { console.log(error); }); }, []) const update =(()=>{ axios.patch(`http://localhost:5000/admin/updateproductdata/${id}`, { images:file, title:title, price:price, discount:discount, discription:discription, productType:productType }) .then(function (response) { console.log(response); console.log(response.data); setTitle(response.data.data.title) setPrice(response.data.data.price) setDiscount(response.data.data.discount) setDiscription(response.data.data.discription) setProductType(response.data.data.productType) }) .catch(function (error) { console.log(error); }); }) return ( <> <>
